1. How thick is the screen protector and will it affect the sensitivity of my touch screen? Our films are ultra-thin at 0.013 inches (0.33 mm) thick, and is reliable and flexible, High touch sensitivity provides a "true-to-touch" feel and ensures fast response performance. 2. Is this screen protector suitable for protective cases? Yes, it can be applied to various protective covers. The size of this screen protector is designed with a marginal gap, so it can fit all protective cases easily. 3. Is it difficult to install the screen protector? Easy to install, For the installation of protective film, HPTech provides a detailed video installation guide, just follow the instructions. 4. How do I remove air bubbles? Before installing,use the cleaning tools included in the package to clean the screen. If there are bubbles,can use hard edged cards to gently push the bubbles.But the screen surface needs to be padded with a thin cloth to avoid scratching the screen. 5. The product is cracked or the model is wrong after receiving it? If you encounter product damage or have any questions about the product. You can send us an email through the Amazon platform, and our after-sales service team will serve you wholeheartedly. Solving your problem makes you happy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap/ easy to use/ protects phone
reviews.reviewText: My husband breaks every phone he owns within 2/3 weeks from cracking the screen to the point of no return. I was tired of it, Ordered a hybrid 3 layer sleek phone case from amazon and these screen protectors. Unfortunately, within a week of using the first screen protector, he did in fact crack the screen protector but it protected the phone. Then he cracked the second one in 3 weeks. So as for durability, I am not sure if he's just that rough or they don't take impact well enough to last long. But they will in fact protect your phone screen!It's worth trying, but I just ordered a different brand to test those out instead! I am not trying to buy multiple screen protectors a month haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good soldier, honored me well
reviews.reviewText: A little difficult lining up ear slot.Dropped my phone a few times, hard.It cracked, but my phone was not damaged.Had to finally replace it due to too many cracks hurting my finger when I swiped.When I peeled it off, cracks were only on the protective screen NOT my phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Protects the phone well.
reviews.reviewText: I would have given it a 5 star but the first package I received had broken shields in the box. They were great in replacing it right away, actually the next day and I didn’t have to wait for the shields. They fit very well and is easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this screen protector!
reviews.reviewText: I finally got to the point where my old protector was all scratched and busted. So I looked around and found this one. I bought it and haven’t regretted it. These are so smooth! The phone color of the screen looks like it is brand new. You can not go wrong with this screen protector!
